info.name: Paranoid Gram
info.description: A customizable dark Instagram theme with a few animations and effects. Right click is enabled in posts and stories. You can change every colour inside the theme. Feel free to suggest changes/give feedback. My Social Media To use a background image, send the image you want to use as the background to a contact on Instagram or use the picture of an Instagram post. right click > open image in new tab and copy the link to that image. you can paste that link in the field "Enter URL" once you click "customize settings" If you upload the image it won't work, it has to be the method above.
